name: /Collection2 (soundscapes of Lisbon) - #11 Jardim de Belém
description:
I was in Lisbon between 10/2019 and 03/2020 when I made many soundscape recordings during my audio classes at the University of Lusofona. Bringing Murray Schaffer's concept with me, I studied the city's sound at various points, allowing a total immersion in the various areas of the city as well as creating a historical record with a scientific method of these environments.

/Soundscape with Zoom H5 PRO
/Location Jardim de Belém - Lisbon - Portugal
/Date 2019-10-14
/Time 16:30:00
/Static No
/Creative Commons No
/Binaural Yes
/Audio 48khz 16bits raw in .wav
/Coordinates 38.6962831,-9.2054644
